verses.verse: וַיֵּ֥רֶד <WH3381> went down שִׁמְשׁ֖וֹן <WH8123> And Samson תִּמְנָ֑תָה <WH8553> to Timnath וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> and saw אִשָּׁ֛ה <WH802> a woman בְּתִמְנָ֖תָה <WH8553> in Timnath מִבְּנ֥וֹת <WH1323> of the daughters פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> of the Philistines

וַיַּ֗עַל <WH5927> And he came up וַיַּגֵּד֙ <WH5046> and told לְאָבִ֣יו <WH1> his father וּלְאִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> and his mother וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said אִשָּׁ֛ה <WH802> a woman רָאִ֥יתִי <WH7200> I have seen בְתִמְנָ֖תָה <WH8553> in Timnath מִבְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> of the daughters פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> now קְחוּ־ <WH3947> now therefore get אוֹתָ֥הּ <WH853> לִּ֖י לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> her for me to wife

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said ל֜וֹ אָבִ֣יו <WH1> Then his father וְאִמּ֗וֹ <WH517> and his mother הַאֵין֩ <WH369> unto him [Is there] never בִּבְנ֨וֹת <WH1323> among the daughters אַחֶ֤יךָ <WH251> of thy brethren וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all עַמִּי֙ <WH5971> or among all my people אִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> a woman כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> you הוֹלֵךְ֙ <WH1980> that thou goest לָקַ֣חַת <WH3947> to take אִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> a wife מִפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> Philistine הָעֲרֵלִ֑ים <WH6189> of the uncircumcised וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said שִׁמְשׁ֤וֹן <WH8123> Samson אֶל־ <WH413> to his אָבִיו֙ <WH1> unto his father אוֹתָ֣הּ <WH853> קַֽח־ <WH3947> Get לִ֔י כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הִ֖יא <WH1931> he יָשְׁרָ֥ה <WH3474> good בְעֵינָֽי׃ <WH5869> affliction

וְאָבִ֨יו <WH1> But his father וְאִמּ֜וֹ <WH517> and his mother לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not יָדְע֗וּ <WH3045> knew כִּ֤י <WH3588> that it was מֵיְהוָה֙ <WH3068> not that it [was] of the LORD הִ֔יא <WH1931> he כִּי־ <WH3588> for תֹאֲנָ֥ה <WH8385> an occasion הֽוּא־ <WH1931> He מְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <WH1245> that he sought מִפְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> against the Philistines וּבָעֵ֣ת <WH6256> for at that time הַהִ֔יא <WH1931> he פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> the Philistines מֹשְׁלִ֥ים <WH4910> had dominion בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> over Israel פ

וַיֵּ֧רֶד <WH3381> down שִׁמְשׁ֛וֹן <WH8123> Samson וְאָבִ֥יו <WH1> and his father וְאִמּ֖וֹ <WH517> and his mother תִּמְנָ֑תָה <WH8553> to Timnath וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> and came עַד־ <WH5704> far כַּרְמֵ֣י <WH3754> to the vineyards תִמְנָ֔תָה <WH8553> of Timnath וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> and behold כְּפִ֣יר <WH3715> and behold a young אֲרָי֔וֹת <WH738> lion שֹׁאֵ֖ג <WH7580> roared לִקְרָאתֽוֹ׃ <WH7125> against

וַתִּצְלַ֨ח <WH6743> came mightily עָלָ֜יו <WH5921> and ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> And the Spirit יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַֽיְשַׁסְּעֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH8156> upon him and he rent כְּשַׁסַּ֣ע <WH8156> him as he would have rent הַגְּדִ֔י <WH1423> a kid וּמְא֖וּמָה <WH3972> and [he had] nothing אֵ֣ין <WH369> had בְּיָד֑וֹ <WH3027> in his hand וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> did not הִגִּיד֙ <WH5046> but he told לְאָבִ֣יו <WH1> not his father וּלְאִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> or his mother אֵ֖ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> what עָשָֽׂה׃ <WH6213> what he had done
וַיֵּ֖רֶד <WH3381> And he went down וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> and talked לָאִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> with the woman וַתִּישַׁ֖ר <WH3474> good בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> affliction שִׁמְשֽׁוֹן׃ <WH8123> Samson

וַיָּ֤שָׁב <WH7725> he returned מִיָּמִים֙ <WH3117> And after a time לְקַחְתָּ֔הּ <WH3947> to take וַיָּ֣סַר <WH5493> her and he turned aside לִרְא֔וֹת <WH7200> to see אֵ֖ת <WH853> מַפֶּ֣לֶת <WH4658> the carcase הָאַרְיֵ֑ה <WH738> of the lion וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> and behold עֲדַ֧ת <WH5712> and behold [there was] a swarm דְּבוֹרִ֛ים <WH1682> of bees בִּגְוִיַּ֥ת <WH1472> in the carcase הָאַרְיֵ֖ה <WH738> of the lion וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <WH1706> and honey

וַיִּרְדֵּ֣הוּ <WH7287> And he took אֶל־ <WH413> about כַּפָּ֗יו <WH3709> thereof in his hands וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <WH1980> and came הָלוֹךְ֙ <WH1980> went וְאָכֹ֔ל <WH398> eating וַיֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH1980> came אֶל־ <WH413> to his אָבִ֣יו <WH1> to his father וְאֶל־ <WH413> and אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> and mother וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> and he gave לָהֶ֖ם וַיֹּאכֵ֑לוּ <WH398> them and they did eat וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not הִגִּ֣יד <WH5046> but he told לָהֶ֔ם כִּ֛י <WH3588> out מִגְּוִיַּ֥ת <WH1472> out of the carcase הָאַרְיֵ֖ה <WH738> of the lion רָדָ֥ה <WH7287> not them that he had taken הַדְּבָֽשׁ׃ <WH1706> the honey

וַיֵּ֥רֶד <WH3381> went down אָבִ֖יהוּ <WH1> So his father אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> unto the woman וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <WH6213> made שָׁ֤ם <WH8033> there שִׁמְשׁוֹן֙ <WH8123> and Samson מִשְׁתֶּ֔ה <WH4960> there a feast כִּ֛י <WH3588> for כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> this יַעֲשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> to do הַבַּחוּרִֽים׃ <WH970> for so used the young men

וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> become כִּרְאוֹתָ֣ם <WH7200> And it came to pass when they saw אוֹת֑וֹ <WH853> וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <WH3947> him that they brought שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> thirty מֵֽרֵעִ֔ים <WH4828> companions וַיִּהְי֖וּ <WH1961> become אִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH854> for

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לָהֶם֙ שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <WH8123> And Samson אָחֽוּדָה־ <WH2330> unto them I will now put forth נָּ֥א <WH4994> now לָכֶ֖ם חִידָ֑ה <WH2420> a riddle אִם־ <WH518> if הַגֵּ֣ד <WH5046> unto you if ye can certainly תַּגִּידוּ֩ <WH5046> declare אוֹתָ֨הּ <WH853> לִ֜י שִׁבְעַ֨ת <WH7651> it me within the seven יְמֵ֤י <WH3117> days הַמִּשְׁתֶּה֙ <WH4960> of the feast וּמְצָאתֶ֔ם <WH4672> and find [it] out וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> then I will give לָכֶם֙ שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> you thirty סְדִינִ֔ים <WH5466> sheets וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <WH7970> and thirty חֲלִפֹ֥ת <WH2487> change בְּגָדִֽים׃ <WH899> of garments

וְאִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תוּכְלוּ֮ <WH3201> But if ye cannot לְהַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> declare לִי֒ וּנְתַתֶּ֨ם <WH5414> [it] me then shall ye give אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> you לִי֙ שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> me thirty סְדִינִ֔ים <WH5466> sheets וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <WH7970> and thirty חֲלִיפ֣וֹת <WH2487> change בְּגָדִ֑ים <WH899> of garments וַיֹּ֣אמְרוּ <WH559> And they said ל֔וֹ ח֥וּדָה <WH2330> unto him Put forth חִידָתְךָ֖ <WH2420> thy riddle וְנִשְׁמָעֶֽנָּה׃ <WH8085> that we may hear

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said לָהֶ֗ם מֵהָֽאֹכֵל֙ <WH398> unto them Out of the eater יָצָ֣א <WH3318> came forth מַאֲכָ֔ל <WH3978> meat וּמֵעַ֖ז <WH5794> and out of the strong יָצָ֣א <WH3318> came forth מָת֑וֹק <WH4966> sweetness וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not יָכְל֛וּ <WH3201> And they could לְהַגִּ֥יד <WH5046> expound הַחִידָ֖ה <WH2420> the riddle שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <WH7969> not in three יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> days

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> came בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <WH7637> And it came to pass on the seventh וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <WH559> that they said לְאֵֽשֶׁת־ <WH802> wife שִׁמְשׁוֹן֙ <WH8123> unto Samson's פַּתִּ֣י <WH6601> Entice אֶת־ <WH853> אִישֵׁ֗ךְ <WH376> thy husband וְיַגֶּד־ <WH5046> that he may declare לָ֙נוּ֙ אֶת־ <WH853> הַ֣חִידָ֔ה <WH2420> unto us the riddle פֶּן־ <WH6435> or נִשְׂרֹ֥ף <WH8313> lest we burn אוֹתָ֛ךְ <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house אָבִ֖יךְ <WH1> thee and thy father's בָּאֵ֑שׁ <WH784> with fire הַלְיָרְשֵׁ֕נוּ <WH3423> us to take that we have קְרָאתֶ֥ם <WH7121> have ye called לָ֖נוּ הֲלֹֽא׃ <WH3808> not

וַתֵּבְךְּ֩ <WH1058> wept אֵ֨שֶׁת <WH802> wife שִׁמְשׁ֜וֹן <WH8123> And Samson's עָלָ֗יו <WH5921> before וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> before him and said רַק־ <WH7535> but שְׂנֵאתַ֙נִי֙ <WH8130> Thou dost but hate וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not אֲהַבְתָּ֔נִי <WH157> me and lovest הַֽחִידָ֥ה <WH2420> a riddle חַ֙דְתָּ֙ <WH2330> me not thou hast put forth לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> of my people וְלִ֖י לֹ֣א <WH3808> not הִגַּ֑דְתָּה <WH5046> and hast not told וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> [it] me And he said לָ֗הּ הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> to her Behold לְאָבִ֧י <WH1> [it] my father וּלְאִמִּ֛י <WH517> nor my mother לֹ֥א <WH3808> have not הִגַּ֖דְתִּי <WH5046> unto her Behold I have not told וְלָ֥ךְ אַגִּֽיד׃ <WH5046> and shall I tell

וַתֵּ֤בְךְּ <WH1058> And she wept עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> before שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> before him the seven הַיָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> days אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> while הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> lasted לָהֶ֖ם הַמִּשְׁתֶּ֑ה <WH4960> while their feast וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> lasted בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <WH7637> and it came to pass on the seventh וַיַּגֶּד־ <WH5046> that he told לָהּ֙ כִּ֣י <WH3588> her because הֱצִיקַ֔תְהוּ <WH6693> her because she lay sore וַתַּגֵּ֥ד <WH5046> upon him and she told הַחִידָ֖ה <WH2420> the riddle לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> to the children עַמָּֽהּ׃ <WH5971> of her people

וַיֹּ֣אמְרוּ <WH559> said לוֹ֩ אַנְשֵׁ֨י <WH376> the men הָעִ֜יר <WH5892> of the city בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <WH7637> unto him on the seventh בְּטֶ֙רֶם֙ <WH2962> before יָבֹ֣א <WH935> went down הַחַ֔רְסָה <WH2775> before the sun מַה־ <WH4100> What מָּת֣וֹק <WH4966> What [is] sweeter מִדְּבַ֔שׁ <WH1706> honey וּמֶ֥ה <WH4100> What עַ֖ז <WH5794> is stronger מֵאֲרִ֑י <WH738> lion וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said לָהֶ֔ם לוּלֵא֙ <WH3884> unto them If חֲרַשְׁתֶּ֣ם <WH2790> ye had not plowed בְּעֶגְלָתִ֔י <WH5697> with my heifer לֹ֥א <WH3808> not מְצָאתֶ֖ם <WH4672> ye had not found out חִידָתִֽי׃ <WH2420> my riddle

וַתִּצְלַ֨ח <WH6743> came עָלָ֜יו <WH5921> Then ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> And the Spirit יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיֵּ֨רֶד <WH3381> upon him and he went down אַשְׁקְל֜וֹן <WH831> to Ashkelon וַיַּ֥ךְ <WH5221> and slew מֵהֶ֣ם ׀ <WH1992> like שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> thirty אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> men וַיִּקַּח֙ <WH3947> of them and took אֶת־ <WH853> חֲלִ֣יצוֹתָ֔ם <WH2488> their spoil וַיִּתֵּן֙ <WH5414> and gave הַחֲלִיפ֔וֹת <WH2487> change לְמַגִּידֵ֖י <WH5046> of garments unto them which expounded הַחִידָ֑ה <WH2420> the riddle וַיִּ֣חַר <WH2734> was kindled אַפּ֔וֹ <WH639> And his anger וַיַּ֖עַל <WH5927> and he went up בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house אָבִֽיהוּ׃ <WH1> to his father's פ

וַתְּהִ֖י <WH1961> become אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> wife שִׁמְשׁ֑וֹן <WH8123> But Samson's לְמֵ֣רֵעֵ֔הוּ <WH4828> was [given] to his companion אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who רֵעָ֖ה <WH7462> whom he had used as his friend לֽוֹ׃
